member.summary: Packages the component for a given component YAML configuration file

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.UploadComponents(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentUploadSettings,System.String[])
member.summary: Finds and Uploads .xam component packages which match the globbing patterns
member.param: The globbing patterns to find .xam component package files with.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.UploadComponent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentUploadSettings)
member.summary: Uploads a .xam component package which is a new version of an existing component in the store

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.SubmitComponents(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentSubmitSettings,System.String[])
member.summary: Finds and Submits .xam component packages which match the globbing patterns
member.param: The globbing patterns to find .xam component package files with.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.SubmitComponent(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Xamarin.XamarinComponentSubmitSettings)
member.summary: Submits a .xam component package which is a brand new component on the store and has no previous versions

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.UITest(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,Cake.Common.Tools.NUnit.NUnitSettings)
member.summary: Runs UITests in a given assembly using NUnit

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.TestCloud(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String,System.String,System.String,Cake.Core.IO.DirectoryPath,Cake.Xamarin.TestCloudSettings)
member.summary: Uploads an android .APK package to TestCloud and runs UITests
member.param: The hash of the set of devices to run on.
The directory containing the UITests assemblies.

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.BuildAndroidApk(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Action{Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings})
member.summary: Creates an android .APK package file using the MSBuild target `SignAndroidPackage` See documentation for more info: https://developer.xamarin.com/guides/android/under_the_hood/build_process/#Build_Targets
member.returns: The file path of the .APK which was created (all subfolders of the project file specified are searched for .apk files and the newest one found is returned).
member.param: Will create a signed .APK file if set to true based on the signing settings in the .CSPROJ, otherwise the .APK will be unsigned.
The MSBuild /p:Configuration to use (default is Release).

member.name: M:Cake.Xamarin.XamarinAliases.BuildiOSIpa(Cake.Core.ICakeContext,Cake.Core.IO.FilePath,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Cake.Common.Tools.MSBuild.MSBuildSettings})
member.summary: Creates an IPA archive of an iOS Appof an app with MDTool Change your project settings to output an IPA file, and use the MSBuild to build. See documentation for more info: https://developer.xamarin.com/guides/ios/deployment,_testing,_and_metrics/app_distribution/ipa_support/#Building_via_the_Command_Line_On_Mac
member.param: The MSBuild /p:Configuration to use (default is Release).
The MSBuild /p:Platform to build with configuration to use (default is iPhone).

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Tests should be run in parallel by Test Method.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Tests should be run in parallel by Test Fixture.
member.value: true if Test fixtures should be run in parallel; otherwise, false.
